articles.author: Joel Khalili
articles.title: Craig Wright Lied About Creating Bitcoin And Faked Evidence, Judge Rules
articles.description: A UK judge has determined that Craig Wright forged evidence in a campaign to prove he is Satoshi Nakamoto, creator of Bitcoin, in a move that prevents him from bringing further lawsuits in the country.
articles.content: Weve seen a cascading effect from the pronouncement on a host of other litigations globally, says Grewal. For people outside of crypto, [all this] might sound cartoonish. But with Wrights claims fall… [+3320 chars]

articles.title: FTX Creditors Say Payout Deal Is 'an Insult'—and Plan to Revolt
articles.description: FTX has a plan to repay its former crypto customers more than the billions of dollars they lost in the latest bankruptcy proposal. But some will reject it anyway.
